name: Acolyte
description: You devoted yourself to service in a temple, learning sacred rites and providing sacrifices to the god or gods you worship. Serving the gods and discovering their sacred works will guide you to greatness.

features.name: Magic Initiate (Cleric)
features.description: You learn two cantrips and one 1st-level spell from the Cleric spell list. You can cast the 1st-level spell once per Long Rest without a spell slot.
